DOC.brief_summary: Despite aggressive CPR training , outcome cardiac arrest good . The problem method education . So , investigator want add dispatcher-assisted CPR simulation conventional CPR training . In study , investigator aim investigate effect new CPR train program .
DOC.brief_title: Before After Community Intervention Trial With Dispatcher Assisted CPR Program
DOC.detailed_description: The training program focus work team dispatcher , perform step recognize cardiac arrest perform CPR , together dispatcher . The one hour train session split four part : 1 . Video self-instruction manikin practice ( 30 min ) , include brief introduction AED . 2 . Practice pair ( 15 min ) . Practicing dispatcher rescuer role simulation enhance learning . 3 . Debriefing . Questions , answer reflection ( 15 min ) . 4 . Homework . Leaflet task like learn activate speaker function phone . The main difference DA-BLS traditional BLS training DA-BLS provide scene interactive experience call EMS receive CPR instruction via telephone speaker function , follow skill train scenario simulation training .
DOC.criteria: All OHCA patient presume cardiac etiology 15 year age old assess treat EMS provider dispatch EMS dispatch center include . We exclude patient noncardiac etiology , prolong cardiac arrest suspect duration 30 minute , case livor mortis rigor mortis , decapitate decomposed body , patient `` DoNotResuscitate '' card document doctor .
